LC_EVENT_1 description: Hello Mercenary! A little birdy told me that the mall off the interchange got a restock from Terragroup. The shelves are filled with food and the stores are just bursting with things for those with sticky fingers to grab. I think its a load of hogwash. If thats the case the place would be absolutely crawling with lowlifes like me! Do you think you can check it out for me? Just pop off a yellow flare at the power substation, if the rumors are true and maybe thin the herd a bit. Nothing crazy just a couple bodies in a corner to mark our claim. ( SWAG + Donuts is recommended to be set to Live Like)
LC_EVENT_1 completePlayerMessage: So the rumors are true! Interesting. Very Interesting.
LC_EVENT_1 successMessageText: So the rumors are true! Interesting. Very Interesting.
LC_EVENT_1 TASK1: Use a signal flare (yellow) at the top of the power station (in the same raid)
LC_EVENT_1 TASK2: Thin the herd. Eliminate 5 targets (in the same raid)
LC_EVENT_2 description: Alright Mercenary we have work to do. If the mall is restocked then that means KIBA arms should be restocked. Get me a sampling of those weapons will ya. The more the merrier. Shouldn't be a big deal for a rough and tumble guy like yourself. I'll even give you the fucking keys! Get to it before they are all gone.
LC_EVENT_2 completePlayerMessage: Are you serious! Glukhar and his gang are trying to take over the mall to control the weapons. Fuck!
LC_EVENT_2 successMessageText: Are you serious! Glukhar and his gang are trying to take over the mall to control the weapons. Fuck!
LC_EVENT_2 TASK1: Hand in 5 found in raid M4A1s
LC_EVENT_2 TASK2: Hand in 5 found in raid P90s
LC_EVENT_2 TASK2 Find: Find in 5 found in raid P90s
LC_EVENT_2 TASK3: Hand in 5 found in raid mp7s
LC_EVENT_2 TASK4: Hand in 3 found in raid VSSs
LC_EVENT_2 TASK5: Hand in 3 found in raid HK 416A5s
LC_EVENT_3 description: Alright Mercenary I got one last big ask of you. I need you to off those brothers and that upstart glukhar. Make sure you do it all at once. Sends a better message that way. I promise the rewards will be well worth the effort!
LC_EVENT_3 completePlayerMessage: You did it? Ha! I actually didn't think it was possible! You are absolutely mad! Glad you are on my side
LC_EVENT_3 successMessageText: You did it? Ha! I actually didn't think it was possible! You are absolutely mad! Glad you are on my side
LC_EVENT_3 TASK1: Eliminate Killa in the same raid
LC_EVENT_3 TASK2: Eliminate Tagilla in the same raid
LC_EVENT_3 TASK3: Eliminate Glukhar in the same raid
